Interactions: It appears you didn't heed my warning my young bearer of italian delicacy.
You may be wondering where you are.
I don't remember exactly where THIS is!
It's a work in progress ok!
We just need to find a way to get you back to the lab.
There must be a door somewhere around here that'll get you back!
You never know what may lie beyond any given door.
We don't want the pizza to get cold!
Aw, man, looks like you went and looked into the door.
Well, I guess you're kinda stuck in there.
But I want that pizza, so let's find out how to get you out!
